segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, creating a puddle that’s getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand how she hasn’t noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a mess, and someone might slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will be the ones to notice first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he probably won’t see the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl might step in the puddle and slip, but she’s too busy waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to be in for a shock when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt before she realizes what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
